Verses: 1 annaatkalil Esekkiyaa Vyaadhippattu Maranaththukku Edhuvaayirundhaan; Appozhudhu Aamodhsin Kumaaranaagiya Esaayaa Ennum Theerkkadharisi Avanidaththil Vandhu, Avanai Nokki: Neer Umadhu Veettukkaariyaththai Ozhunguppaduththum, Neer Pizhaikkamaatteer, Mariththuppoveer Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
2 appozhudhu Esekkiyaa Thanmugaththai Suvarppuramaagath Thiruppikkondu, Karththarai Nokki:
3 aa Karththaave, Naan Umakku Munbaaga Unmaiyum Mana Uththamamumaai Nadandhu, Umadhu Paarvaikku Nalamaanadhai Seydhen Enbadhai Ninaiththarulum Endru Vinnappampanni, Esekkiyaa Migavum Azhudhaan.
4 appozhudhu Esaayaavukku Undaana Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyaavadhu:

5 nee Poi Esekkiyaavai Nokki: Un Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhin Dhevanaayirukkira Karththar Sollugiradhu Ennavendraal, Un Vinnappaththaik Ketten; Un Kanneeraik Kanden; Idho, Un Naatkalode Padhinaindhu Varusham Koottuven.
6 naan Unnaiyum Indha Nagaraththaiyum Aseeriyaa Raajaavin Kaikkuth Thappuviththu Indha Nagaraththukku Aadharavaayiruppen.
7 idho, Aagaasudaiya Sooriyakadiyaaraththil Paagaikkup Paagai Irangina Saayaiyaip Paththuppaagai Pinnittuth Thiruppuven Endraar.

8 thaam Sonna Indha Vaarththaiyinpadi Karththar Seyvaar Enbadharku Idhu Karththaraal Unakku Adaiyaalamaayirukkum Endru Sol Endraar; Appadiye Kadiyaaraththil Irangiyirundha Sooriyasaayai Paththuppaagai Thirumbitru.
9 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Esekkiyaa Vyaadhippattu, Than Vyaadhi Neengi Sosthamaanapodhu Ezhudhivaiththadhaavadhu:
10 naan En Poorana Aayusin Varushangalukku Seraamal Paadhaalaththin Vaasalgalukkutpaduven Endru En Naatkal Aruppungirapodhu Sonnen.
11 karththarai, Karththarai, Naan Ini Uyirodirukkiravargalin Dhesaththile Dharisippadhillai; Ini Poologakkudigalode Irundhu Manusharai Naan Kaanbadhillai.

12 en Aayusu Meyppanudaiya Koodaaraththaippola Ennaivittup Peyarndhupogiradhu; Neygiravan Paavai Arukkiradhupola En Jeevanai Arukkak Kodukkiren; Ennaip Paavilirundhu Aruththuvidugiraar; Indru Iravukkulle Ennai Mudivadaiyappannuveer.
13 vidiyarkaalamattum Naan Ennamittukkondirundhen; Avar Singampol En Elumbugalaiyellaam Norukkuvaar; Indru Iravukkulle Ennai Mudivadaiyappannuveer Endru Solli,

14 namuttaippolum, Thagaivilaan Kuruviyaippolum Koovinen, Puraavaippol Pulambinen; En Kangal Uyarap Paarkkiradhinaal Pooththuppoyina;karththaave, Odungippogiren; En Kaariyaththai Merpottukkollum Endren.
15 naan Enna Solluven? Avar Enakku Vaakku Arulinaar; Andhappragaarame Seydhaar; En Aayusin Varushangalilellaam En Aaththumaavin Kasappai Ninaiththu Nadandhukolven.
16 aandavare, Ivaigalinaal Manushar Pizhaikkiraargal; Ivaigalellaam En Uyirkku Uyiraayirukkiradhu; Ennai Sosthappadavum Pizhaikkavumpannineer.

17 idho, Samaadhaanaththukkup Padhilaaga Magaa Kasappu Vandhirundhadhu, Dhevareero En Aaththumaavai Nesiththu Azhivin Kuzhikku Vilakkineer; En Paavangalaiyellaam Umadhu Mudhugukkup Pinnaaga Erindhuvitteer.
18 paadhaalam Ummaith Thudhiyaadhu, Maranam Ummaip Potraadhu; Kuzhiyilirangugiravargal Ummudaiya Saththiyaththai Dhiyaanippadhillai.
19 naan Indru Seygiradhupola, Uyirodirukkiravan, Uyirodirukkiravane, Ummaith Thudhippaan, Thagappan Pillaigalukku Umadhu Saththiyaththaith Therivippaan.
20 karththar Ennai Ratchikkavandhaar; Aagaiyaal Engal Jeevanaalellaam Karththarudaiya Aalayaththile En Keedhavaaththiyangalai Vaasiththup Paaduvom Endru Ezhudhivaiththaan.
21 aththippazhaththu Adaiyaik Konduvandhu, Pilavaiyinmel Patruppodungal; Appozhudhu Pizhaippaar Endru Esaayaa Solliyirundhaan.
22 appozhudhu Esekkiyaa: Naan Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkup Povadharku Adaiyaalam Ennavendru Kettirundhaan.
